channel.title: Items open interfaces! help!
channel.description:
hey,
My problem begins with a few commands i've been making. Basics for servers, you know, ::guide, ::rules, and ::commands. Anyway, I have these two items, their actually book-like objects, and I need to know how to make them open my ::guide or ::rules. So when i click "read" i wan't it to pop up and say "Welcome to **scape! Here are the rules!" or something like that. I don't see very many help questions answered here so i think this might be a waste of time, but if you could help me out, that'd be great.

item.title: Items open interfaces! help!
item.dc:creator: @hasumon hasumon
item.description:
@hasumon wrote:

Try RS2 Development/Help nawrb

Read full topic

hey,

My problem begins with a few commands i’ve been making. Basics for servers, you know, ::guide, ::rules, and ::commands.
Anyway, I have these two items, their actually book-like objects, and I need to know how to make them open my ::guide or ::rules. I don’t see very many help questions answered here so i think this might be a waste of time, but if you could help me out, that’d be great.
